query:
INSERT INTO cve_scans 
            (evaluation_target_id, status, attempts, scanner_name, scan_metadata)
        VALUES ($1, 'failed', 1, 'vulnix', $2)
        ON CONFLICT (evaluation_target_id) DO UPDATE SET
            status = 'failed',
            attempts = cve_scans.attempts + 1,
            scan_metadata = $2,
            created_at = NOW()
